loginModal.title: Sign in/Sing up
loginModal.infoText: Welcome to our vibrant digital nomad community hub! Join us to freely share tips, organize meetups, and be part of a thriving network of nomads worldwide. Connect, collaborate, and grow together in this inclusive space. Sign in to join the movement!

meta.title: Mountain bikes Canada the mtb news
meta.description: Stay up-to-date on all the latest news from the world of mountain biking. From gear and races, culture and lifestyle, we cover it all. The MTB community!

welcomeText.p1: Welcome to Mountain Bikes Canada ‚Äì the source for all things MTB in Canada! Whether you're a veteran rider or just starting out, discover expert tips, trail guides, and the necessary bike services to fuel your mountain biking adventures. We provide everything you need to ride with confidence across Canada‚Äôs diverse landscapes. Join us and explore the best biking experiences this beautiful country has to offer.
welcomeText.p2: From rugged mountain trails to scenic ancient forest paths, Canada is home to some of the world‚Äôs most iconic MTB destinations. Our rider owned team is here to help you find the best routes, offering knowledge on local trails, local culture, and events. We also offer repair services to ensure your bike is in peak condition for every ride.
welcomeText.p3: At Mountain Bikes Canada, we believe in fostering a strong community of riders who share a passion for adventure. Our website is not just about bikes, it‚Äôs a place where you can connect with riders, exchange stories, and stay up-to-date with the latest MTB news. Whether you‚Äôre aiming for your first race or just looking for your next trail challenge, we‚Äôve got the resources to help you achieve your goals.

topBanner.title: Work & Explore with Room Solvers
topBanner.text: Discover Your New Home, Anywhere in the World

textSection.paragraph: Do you want to explore new places as you work? Room Solvers provides affordable medium to long term housing options, allowing you to continue working as you explore new places. Our platform assists you in finding comfortable accommodations with high-speed internet connection for stays for 1 to 12 months. It‚Äôs ideal for freelancers and remote workers looking for freedom to travel while working.

list.title: Work Anywhere
list.text: Whether you dream to work in cozy chalet or a vibrant city, we've got you covered.

list.title: Seamless Booking
list.text: Room Solvers simplifies the process by allowing you to browse, book, and secure your ideal home.

list.title: Remote Work-Ready
list.text: Each property listed on Room Solvers ensures you have high-speed internet and a workspace.

list.title: Flexible Stays
list.text: Room Solvers offers accommodations from 1 to 12 months.

list.title: Community and Support
list.text: Join a community of like-minded travelers and remote workers who share tips, experiences, and advice. Plus, our support team is here to assist you on every step of the way.

/forum.metaTitle: Connect with Global Nomads | Roomsolvers Forum - Your Hub for Digital Nomad Living
/forum.metaDescription: Join now our forum, where Digital Nomads worldwide converge to share insights, tips, and experiences. Discover remote work opportunities, find accommodation hacks, and connect with the community. Your digital nomad journey with Roomsolvers starts now!
/forum.title: Nomad Connect: Where Wanderers Unite
/forum.description:
Welcome to the RoomSolvers forumüåç‚úàÔ∏è, here you can post any questions, advice or information that you think will be helpful to the community.

The rules are very simple: 
 - Don't share personal information or sensitive content 
 - Do not encourage or engage in illegal activities. 
 - Engage in constructive and respectful discussions. Avoid derailing threads or posting irrelevant content. 
 - Use appropriate usernames and profile pictures. 
 - Violation of these rules may result in a warning, temporary ban, or permanent ban, depending on the severity and frequency of the violation. 
 - By joining and participating in this forum, you agree to these rules and guidelines. Our goal is to ensure a welcoming and constructive environment for all members. 
 - These rules may be updated or changed at any time. It's your responsibility to stay informed about the forum rules.

/login.title: Welcome to ProcessAi
/login.text: Sign in to access your personal automation hub, where you can design, chain, and deploy smart workflows. Every process you create is instantly available as an API, ready to connect with your apps and tools. Build faster, automate smarter, and bring your ideas to life with AI.

/cancel.title: Payment Canceled
/cancel.text1: Your payment process have been canceled.
/cancel.text2: What do you want us to do with the items in your cart? Do you still want to keep them in the cart?

/success.title: Payment Successfully
/success.text1: Thank you for your purchase! We're grateful to inform you that your payment has been received successfully and your order request has been submitted.
/success.text2: You will receive the reservation confirmation and all the details of your order in your email. Also on the email you will find a contact in case you have any doubt or you need any help. üèùÔ∏è

/forgot-password.title: Forgot your password?
/forgot-password.text: No worries ‚Äì it happens to the best of us! Just enter your email below, and we‚Äôll send you a link to reset your password. Follow the steps, and you‚Äôll be back on track in no time.

/password-reset.title: Reset your password
/password-reset.text: Enter your new password below to reset your password. Make sure it‚Äôs secure and easy to remember. Once you‚Äôve done that, you‚Äôll be all set to log in and continue your journey with us.
